name: Nico Robin
text: On Play: If you have two or more rested characters in play, until the end of your opponent's next turn, all of your characters with the <<Odyssey>> or <<Strawhat Crew>> type can't be KOD by effects.

effect.text: If you have two or more rested characters in play, until the end of your opponent's next turn, all of your characters with the <<Odyssey>> or <<Strawhat Crew>> type can't be KOD by effects.
conditions: two or more rested characters in play
